A data transfer object (DTO) that encapsulates filter criteria for querying events through the REST API, supporting filtering by user IDs, event types, and date ranges.

## Key Components

- **userIds** - List of user identifiers to filter events by specific users
- **eventTypes** - List of event type strings to filter by event categories
- **startDate** - LocalDate representing the earliest date to include in results
- **endDate** - LocalDate representing the latest date to include in results

The class uses Lombok annotations for automatic generation of getters, setters, constructors, and builder pattern. Swagger/OpenAPI annotations provide API documentation and examples.

## Usage Example

```java
// Build filter criteria using the builder pattern
EventFilterCriteria criteria = EventFilterCriteria.builder()
    .userIds(List.of("user123", "user456"))
    .eventTypes(List.of("LOGIN", "LOGOUT", "DATA_ACCESS"))
    .startDate(LocalDate.of(2024, 1, 1))
    .endDate(LocalDate.of(2024, 12, 31))
    .build();

// Or create with constructor
EventFilterCriteria criteria2 = new EventFilterCriteria(
    List.of("user789"), 
    List.of("ERROR"), 
    LocalDate.now().minusDays(7), 
    LocalDate.now()
);

// Use in REST controller or service layer
List<Event> filteredEvents = eventService.findEvents(criteria);
```
